plot: 101 Ways to Leave a Game Show features contestants competing in one of the most insane game shows for a chance to win 50,000 dollars! Contestants will match wits in a series of multiple choice questions, with one contestant being eliminated every round. But unlike any other game show in the world, the eliminated contestant will then be ejected from the show in spectacular fashion: being flown away strapped to the wing of a biplane, pushed off the top of a moving semi truck, dragged underwater by a one-ton anchor or yanked off a dock by a speed boat.
title: 101 Ways to Leave a Game Show
